stimulusHtml: The unrest reflected in the image is best explained by which of the following features of the Russian government at the time of the photograph?

features.html:
WORKERS AND SOLDIERS MARCHING IN THE STREETS OF SAINT PETERSBURG, RUSSIAN EMPIRE, AFTER TAKING OVER CONTROL OF THE CITY, FEBRUARY 1917

Keystone-France/Contributor

choicesHtml: The Russian Empire covered a vast land area, much of which was undeveloped economically.
The Tsarist regime that governed Russia was autocratic and unresponsive to calls for reform.
The Russian Empire was composed of many different ethnic groups that had varying degrees of autonomy.
The Tsarist monarchy was tied to the monarchies of Germany and Great Britain by common family links.
